emergency_notice: If you are in immediate danger, call emergency services (000 in Australia, 911 in US)

united_states.name: National Suicide Prevention Lifeline
united_states.description: 24/7 free and confidential support for people in distress

united_states.name: Crisis Text Line
united_states.description: Free 24/7 crisis support via text message

australia.name: Lifeline Australia
australia.description: 24/7 crisis support and suicide prevention services

australia.name: Suicide Call Back Service
australia.description: 24/7 nationwide service for anyone affected by suicide

australia.name: MensLine Australia
australia.description: Professional telephone and online support for men

australia.name: Kids Helpline
australia.description: Counselling service for young people aged 5-25

additional_info.note: These services are independent from Shame to Flame Ministry and are included for public support and crisis assistance
additional_info.location_on_site: Crisis resources displayed on dedicated page at https://shametoflame.faith/crisis-help and also on Contact page at https://shametoflame.faith/contact#emergency
